channel.title: Testings on bytecora

item.title: E2E with Jest And Puppeteer. How I do it.
item.description: As a backend developer E2E testing is a must for me. E2E testing does not only check the features of the frontend, it cares about the whole system. A good match for this purpose on Node it’s the jest and puppeteer tandem for testing web apps. (Note: From now on I assume that you have some experience with the API of both technologies) About the dependencies You will find a bunch of posts about this topic on the internet.
